item.title: Small-cap auto ancillary stock to consider first-ever stock split. Check details

review.headline_rewrite: Small-cap auto ancillary stock to consider first-ever stock split. Check details
bullets: Rolex Rings, one of the leading manufacturers of forged and machined components, informed investors through an exchange filing on Monday that its board of
If approved, this will mark the company’s first-ever stock split.
A stock split is a corporate action initiated by a company to improve the liquidity of its shares in the secondary market.
Investors holding the stock on the record date will receive the newly split shares in their demat accounts.

item.title: Despite challenges, transmission, solar EPC a sweet spot: Hartek Group

bullets: “Hartek Group is gearing up to double its revenue by next year, driven by its expanding footprint in transmission and solar EPC.
For an EPC company, increasing the order book is easy, but timely execution is what truly matters,” Singh emphasised.

item.title: Rent-buy gap widens as EMIs outpace rentals in Indian metros

review.headline_rewrite: Rent-buy gap widens as EMIs outpace rentals in Indian metros
bullets: “Buying an affordable home in metros feels impractical given the exorbitant prices,” says Taher Ahmed, who works as a consultant in Bengaluru.
Prices need correction, or we risk ghost towns like in China.” For others, renting still makes financial and lifestyle sense.
